review.title: “System administration and training”
review.pros: Pros – Getting more knowledge as we got freedom to work and frequent reviews of all departments
review.cons: Cons – lack of motivation, untouched and unorganized resources, pressure on work, lesser employee's welfare activities not recognizing the people who hard in crucial situations
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Suggestion : Executives should be given responsibility with authority. Motivation of employees are very much lacking. The reviews are always on Non conformance only. Positive results can be also highlighted. Appreciation as an motivation should be there on every mileage.
